trans-unit.source: Represents a set of constants that are used to set properties of a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref> security token.
trans-unit.target: 表示一组用于设置属性的常数<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref>安全令牌。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: Use the SamlConstants class to set properties of a SAML assertion.
trans-unit.target: 使用 SamlConstants 类设置 SAML 断言的属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConstants.EmailNamespace%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConstants.UserNameNamespace%2A> properties to set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubject.NameFormat%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConstants.EmailNamespace%2A>和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConstants.UserNameNamespace%2A>属性设置<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubject.NameFormat%2A>属性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubject.NameFormat%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConstants.UserNameNamespace%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConstants.EmailNamespace%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConstants.HolderOfKey%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConstants.SenderVouches%2A> to set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubject.ConfirmationMethods%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConstants.HolderOfKey%2A>和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConstants.SenderVouches%2A>设置<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubject.ConfirmationMethods%2A>属性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubject.ConfirmationMethods%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConstants.SenderVouches%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConstants.HolderOfKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the attribute used to specify that the subject of a SAML assertion is specified as an e-mail address.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于指定 SAML 断言的主题指定为电子邮件地址的属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 此字段为常数。

trans-unit.source: Use the EmailName property when serializing SAML assertions.
trans-unit.target: 在序列化 SAML 断言时，请使用电子邮件名属性。

trans-unit.source: The name of the attribute used to specify that the subject of a SAML assertion is specified as an e-mail address.
trans-unit.target: 用于指定 SAML 断言的主题指定为电子邮件地址的属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 此字段为常数。

trans-unit.source: Gets a URI that states the subject of a SAML assertion is specified as an e-mail address.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 URI，表明 SAML 断言的主题指定为电子邮件地址。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 此字段为常数。

trans-unit.source: Use the EmailNamespace property to set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubject.NameFormat%2A> property when the subject is specified as an e-mail address.
trans-unit.target: 使用 EmailNamespace 属性设置<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubject.NameFormat%2A>属性时的主题指定为电子邮件地址。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubject.NameFormat%2A>

trans-unit.source: A URI that states the subject of a SAML assertion is specified as an e-mail address.
trans-unit.target: 一个 URI，表明 SAML 断言的主题指定为电子邮件地址。

trans-unit.source: Gets a URI that specifies that the recipient of a SAML security token should use the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<ds:KeyInfo>" name="<ds:KeyInfo>" href=""></xref> element to confirm that the SOAP message was sent by the SAML assertion's subject.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 URI，指定 SAML 安全令牌的接收方应使用<xref uid="langword_csharp_<ds:KeyInfo>" name="<ds:KeyInfo>" href=""></xref>元素来确认 SOAP 消息由 SAML 断言的主题发送。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 此字段为常数。

trans-unit.source: Use the HolderOfKey property to set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubject.ConfirmationMethods%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用 HolderOfKey 属性设置<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubject.ConfirmationMethods%2A>属性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubject.ConfirmationMethods%2A>

trans-unit.source: A URI that specifies that the recipient of a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref> security token should use the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<ds:KeyInfo>" name="<ds:KeyInfo>" href=""></xref> element to confirm that the SOAP message was sent by the SAML assertion's subject.
trans-unit.target: 一个 URI，指定的接收方<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref>应使用安全令牌<xref uid="langword_csharp_<ds:KeyInfo>" name="<ds:KeyInfo>" href=""></xref>元素来确认 SOAP 消息由 SAML 断言的主题发送。

trans-unit.source: Gets the major version of the SAML specification that <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref> security tokens conform to.
trans-unit.target: 获取 SAML 规范的主版本<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref>安全令牌所遵循。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 此字段为常数。

trans-unit.source: The combination of the MajorVersionValue and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConstants.MinorVersionValue%2A> properties comprises the version of the SAML specification that <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security tokens conform to.
trans-unit.target: MajorVersionValue 的组合和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConstants.MinorVersionValue%2A>属性包含 SAML 规范的版本，<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken>安全令牌所遵循。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConstants.MinorVersionValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The major version of the SAML specification that <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref> security tokens conform to.
trans-unit.target: SAML 规范的主版本的<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref>安全令牌所遵循。

trans-unit.source: Always `1`.
Gets the minor version of the SAML specification used by <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref> security tokens.
trans-unit.target: 获取使用的 SAML 规范的次版本<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref>安全令牌。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 此字段为常数。

trans-unit.source: The minor version of the SAML specification.
trans-unit.target: SAML 规范的次版本。

trans-unit.source: Always `1`.

The combination of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConstants.MajorVersionValue*> and MinorVersionValue properties comprises the version of the SAML specification that <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref> security tokens conform to.
trans-unit.target: 组合<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConstants.MajorVersionValue*>和 MinorVersionValue 属性包含 SAML 规范的版本， <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"> </xref>安全令牌所遵循。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConstants.MajorVersionValue*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the XML namespace in which SAML assertions are defined.
trans-unit.target: 获取定义在哪个 SAML 断言的 XML 命名空间。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 此字段为常数。

trans-unit.source: The XML namespace is defined in the version of the SAML specification specified by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConstants.MajorVersionValue%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConstants.MinorVersionValue%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的 SAML 规范的版本中定义的 XML 命名空间<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConstants.MajorVersionValue%2A>和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConstants.MinorVersionValue%2A>属性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConstants.MinorVersionValue%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConstants.MajorVersionValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The XML namespace in which SAML assertions are defined.
trans-unit.target: 定义的 SAML 断言的 XML 命名空间。

trans-unit.source: The SAML namespace prefix.
trans-unit.target: SAML 命名空间前缀。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 此字段为常数。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets a URI that specifies that additional information is not available for a recipient of a SAML security token to confirm that the SOAP message was sent by the SAML assertion's subject.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 URI，指定的其他信息不可用来确认 SOAP 消息由 SAML 断言的主题发送 SAML 安全令牌的接收方。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 此字段为常数。

trans-unit.source: Use the SenderVouches property to set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubject.ConfirmationMethods%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用 SenderVouches 属性设置<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubject.ConfirmationMethods%2A>属性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubject.ConfirmationMethods%2A>

trans-unit.source: A URI that specifies that additional information is not available for a recipient of a SAML security token to confirm that the SOAP message was sent by the SAML assertion's subject.
trans-unit.target: 一个 URI，指定的其他信息不可用来确认 SOAP 消息由 SAML 断言的主题发送 SAML 安全令牌的接收方。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the attribute used to specify that the subject of a SAML assertion is specified as a Windows domain account.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于指定 SAML 断言的主题指定为 Windows 域帐户的属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 此字段为常数。

trans-unit.source: Use the UserName property when serializing SAML assertions.
trans-unit.target: 在序列化 SAML 断言时，请使用 UserName 属性。

trans-unit.source: The name of the attribute used to specify that the subject of a SAML assertion is specified as a Windows domain account.
trans-unit.target: 用于指定 SAML 断言的主题指定为 Windows 域帐户的属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 此字段为常数。

trans-unit.source: Gets a URI that states the subject of a SAML assertion is specified using a Windows domain account.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 URI，表明 SAML 断言的主题使用 Windows 域帐户指定。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 此字段为常数。

trans-unit.source: Use the UserNameNamespace property to set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubject.NameFormat%2A> property when the subject is specified as a Windows domain account.
trans-unit.target: 使用 UserNameNamespace 属性设置<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubject.NameFormat%2A>属性时的主题指定为 Windows 域帐户。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubject.NameFormat%2A>

trans-unit.source: A URI that states the subject of a SAML assertion is specified using a Windows domain account.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Windows 域帐户指定一个 URI，表明 SAML 断言的主题。
